how_to_work.title: Complete your profile
how_to_work.content: Complete your profile to unlock the program and make the most out of your loyalty benefits.

how_to_work.title: Earn Stars for every sold item
how_to_work.content: Earn up to 0.5 Star for each sold item and complete sales challenges to boost your Redeemable Stars.

how_to_work.title: Exchange Stars for exclusive rewards
how_to_work.content: As you collect Stars, you can redeem them for special rewards. Start redeeming with as little as 1500 Stars.

how_to_work.title: Higher Tiers, Better Benefits
how_to_work.content: Keep saving Stars to level up and earn bigger rewards.

how_to_work.title: Complete your profile
how_to_work.content: Complete your profile to unlock the program and make the most out of your loyalty benefits.

how_to_work.title: Earn Stars for every sold item
how_to_work.content: Earn up to 0.5 Star for each sold item and complete sales challenges to boost your Redeemable Stars.

how_to_work.title: Exchange Stars for exclusive rewards
how_to_work.content: As you collect Stars, you can redeem them for special rewards. Start redeeming with as little as 1500 Stars.

how_to_work.title: Higher Tiers, Better Benefits
how_to_work.content: Keep saving Stars to level up and earn bigger rewards.
